definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: I'm gonna get out of here someday.
sentences.chinese: 你看到我的手了？這雙手就是掘土機。

sentences.english: They're digging machines. You want to go to China?
sentences.chinese: 這雙手就是掘土機你想到中國去？

sentences.english: Besides the excavators there are three road rollers to load.
sentences.chinese: 除掘土機外，還有三臺壓路機要裝。

sentences.english: Now the question is whether we can take the two excavators with your jumbo boom.
sentences.chinese: 現在的問題是能否用你們的重吊杆搬這兩臺掘土機。

sentences.english: Huge digging machines were needed and crushers to get the gold from the rock.
sentences.chinese: 從岩石中取得黃金需要大型的掘土機和粉碎機。
